import "../components/Timeline.css"; function Timeline() { return (

Adam Harper's Life (so far)

  • May 2023
    I'm a Dad!
    On 9th May 2023, Adam became a father for the first time to Reuben Jospeph Thomas Harper
  • August 2022
    I'm an Application Developer
    After a two year journey of University and self-guided learning, I was offered the role of Application Developer at InHealthcare. Despite being on course for a First Class Honours Degree The decision was made to leave University and continue my programming journey 'on the job'.
  • October 2020
    When you know, you know
    During a re-enforced lockdown, we made our vows in our masks and I married the love of my life.
  • September 2020
    BSc Web Programming
    I began my studies as a full time, mature student at the University of Huddersfield studying towards a BSC Web Programming. I gained experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Wordpress, PHP, SQL Databases, R, Cyber Security, SQL, Adobe applications (Photoshop, Illustrator, Animate), Figma
  • January 2020
    Relocating to Yorkshire
    Just prior to the global pandemic I relocated to Yorkshire to be with my future wife. I secured a role of Export Specialist, training a new team for Drive Devilbiss Healthcare on export procedures and documentation.



    Perhaps a blessing in disguise, the pandemic resulted in complications in carrying out my role, I was subsequently furloughed and used this time to reflect and choose a new path in my career. I decided to pursue something that merged my pragmatic, logical approach to solving problems with my creativiity - programming.{" "}



    In my personal time I began to focus primarily on JavaScript after hearing about how versatile and in demand this language is.
  • 2022
    Title 5
    Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Odit, non.
); } export default Timeline;
